articles.title: Megan Thee Stallion becomes first black woman to cover Forbes ‘30Under30’ - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: United States American Rapper, Megan Thee Stallion, on Monday, was announced as the first black woman to cover Forbes 30 Under 30.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mauna Loa volcano erupts for first time in nearly 40 years - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Hawaiian volcano rising 4169 metres above the Pacific Ocean wasn’t the only one to begin erupting in the Americas.
articles.content:
Hawaiis Mauna Loa, the worlds largest active volcano, has begun erupting for the first time since 1984, ending its longest quiet period in recorded history.
The night sky above Hawaiis largest islan… [+1253 chars]

articles.title: Gaslighting is Merriam-Webster’s word of the year for 2022 - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: American dictionary calls term ‘a word for our time’ in an age of fake news, misinformation and conspiracy theories.
articles.content:
Gaslighting a word that describes behaviour that manipulates the mind, is misleading and downright deceitful is the Merriam-Webster dictionarys word of the year.
